Class: ContactsContainer

ContactsContainer()

Contact Container which accepts props

Constructor

new ContactsContainer()

Properties:
Name Type Description
onSendClick callback when send button is pressed. It will return list of chosen contacts and groups alongwith two booleans timeline and publicPost.
onBack callback when icon is pressed present in the header
onSelectGroupRow callback when a Group is selected
onSelectUserRow callback when a User is selected
sendButtonEnableEligibility callback to enable send button and it will return three thing, selected user count, selected group count and timeline selected
data data is object which contains all the property below this
Properties
Name Type Description
showFriends boolean for showing list of friends
showGroups boolean for showing list of groups, if both showFriends and showGroups are true then it will show lists in TabView with tabLabel else it will show a simple list
selection string of constant value, "MULTI_SELECT", "NO_SELECT", "SELECT_ONE_FROM_EACH" and by default "SINGLE_SELECT"
showTimeline boolean for showing timeline option on contact picker above friends
showAddGroup boolean for showing creategroup option above the groupList
ShowSendButton boolean for showing bottom solid button on the bottom of the contact screen
sendButtonText string for showing text on bottom solid Button
headerText string for showing headertext on contact picker screen
showSearch boolean for showing search icon on the header at right side
showDialog boolean for showing dialog if data.showTimeline is true to select whether u want to post publically or within friends
dialogboxHeading string for showing dialogbox heading
dialogboxSubheading string for showing additional text on dialogbox
negbtntext string for showing text on dialogBox secondary color button
posbtntext string for showing text on dialogBox accent color button

  • components/contactPicker/ContactsContainer.js, line 56
